title: Saturday High School Scoreboard
text:

Updated: Sat, Oct 24 2015, 11:36 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Brad Steinke has highlights of Cooper's 15-13 win over Conner, securing a 6A district title

BEIJING (AP) -- China has cut interest rates for a sixth time in a year to spur slowing growth in the world's second-largest economy.
